title: Should You Build Single Agents or Multi Agent Systems?

interesting, almost a point counterpoint

500 companies. In that example, each sub

is effectively the number one job of
engineers building AI agents. By way of

aents to do those tasks with the main

the agent probably had to make some tool

of all, it's important to remember that
